DOC.brief_title: Detection SLN Patients With Endometrial Cancer Undergoing Robotic Assisted Staging : Comparison ISB ICG
DOC.detailed_description: The study objective compare two sentinel lymph node detection technology [ fluorescence image Indocyanine Green ( ICG ) dye verse standard laparoscopic colorimetric analysis use Isosulfan Blue ( ISB ) dye ] sensitivity specificity detect metastatic disease pelvic lymph node woman endometrial cancer undergo robotic-assisted laparoscopic hysterectomy lymphadenectomy . The following three specific aim would address research proposal : Specific Aim 1 : To determine ability map bilaterally pelvic SLN woman endometrial cancer undergo robotic-assisted laparoscopic stag compare two different method ( i.e. , compare combination colorimetric analysis-ISB dye + fluorescence imaging-ICG dye vs. colorimetric analysis-ISB dye alone ) . Specific Aim 2 : To estimate negative predictive value ( NPV ) pelvic SLN endometrial cancer respect predict nodal metastasis . Specific Aim 3 : To evaluate ability sentinel lymph nodes increase detection metastatic disease ultra-sectioning immuno-histochemical ( IHC ) stain compare IHC result standard hematoxolin eosin ( H & E ) result .
